import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns
source.b4c4e9b3:
for i in df.columns:
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,4))
    val = np.random.randint(100000,999999)
    col = "#" + str(val)
    plt.subplot(1,2,1)
    sns.distplot(df[i], kde = False, color = col, label = i)
    plt.legend()
    plt.subplot(1,2,2)
    sns.boxplot(df[i], color = col)

    plt.show()

source.0fb2d008:
from scipy import stats
for i in df.columns:
    df[i + "_log"] = np.log(df[i]+1)
    df[i + "_exp"] = np.exp(df[i])
    df[i + "_sqrt"] = df[i] ** (1/2)
    df[i + "_rec"] = 1/(df[i])
    df[i + "_box"], param = stats.boxcox(df['Fare']+1)
source.57f0d0df:
for i in df.columns:
    if "rec" in i.lower():
        continue
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,4))
    val = np.random.randint(100000,999999)
    col = "#" + str(val)
    plt.subplot(1,2,1)
    sns.distplot(df[i], kde = False, color = col, label = i)
    plt.legend()
    plt.subplot(1,2,2)
    sns.boxplot(df[i], color = col)

    plt.show()
